docs.text:
Modes


Polling Mode


The 
polling mode
 of Céu-Arduino .




100% cpu




Compilation


Examples that use interrupts have to be compiled with 
CEU_ISR=true
:


make CEU_ISR=true CEU_SRC=samples/isr-01.ceu




Interrupt Mode


The 
interrupt mode
 of Céu-Arduino .




[a,b]


scope
